Html:
Is it possible to set up more than one emulator on a single pc? I am thinking of using the emulators in class, for instruction and to compare different designs and features. It appears to be easier and less expensive to connect a pc running emulation to the classroom projection system, than connecting other devices such as Androids, iPhones or calculators.

Tried placing a copy of the 32 bit wabbitemu software in a separate folder and running the setup again; failed to download the TI84plus SE rom. Got nowhere.

You can actually run Wabbitemu, select the Help menu, and Re-run setup wizard to get a new type of calculator running. Make sure you use the newest version I just put up, as I fixed the OS download from TI. After you have a ROM, you can use File -> New to get another type running. You won't need a second copy of the program.
